reviews.review_text: I came across this place when searching for halal options in Vancouver and this place did not disappoint. While it is somewhat small inside the food here was incredible. The sandwiches were very large with a lot of meat on them and the flavors and textures they added made these sandwiched unique in their own way. The fries here were also really good as they were very crisp on the outside and warm and fluffy on the inside. I would definitely recommend anyone that is passing by to come and eat here.

Exquisite food and service! They greeted us warmly at the entrance and took us to our table promptly. We had the XD burger, steaks, fries, and top gun. The burger buns were homemade as they meticulously explained. The beef patty was VERY DELICIOUS,  and juicy.  the steak was so smooth, and the sauce served along made it a memorable foodie experience. On the other hand, service was 10/10. They listened attentively to our feedback and was constantly making sure that all customers were satisfied with their experience. We thought the food to be a bit expensive when we first glanced at the menu, but we left thinking it was worth every penny. Will definitely go back!

Everything we ordered at this place was better than great. The Cheesesteak was out of this world. I will remember the taste for a while. Truffle fries were amazing. Smash Burgers were great. Id come back here again and Everytime I come back to Vancouver. I highly recommend it.
The best burgers in Vancouver I ve tried so far. Be sure to try potatoes with truffle oil  it s the best potatoes, hearty. With a tip, the check came out about $60

Been trying to dine here for a while as theyre always busy and now I know exactly why: the food is AMAZING! They make everything with care and pride and it shows, 100% recommend  had the Birria Tacos, Garden Salad and Truffle fries!

Nestled within the vibrant core of English Bay, youll find Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak, a gastronomic sanctuary promising an unforgettable encounter. Enter a realm where flavors dance to life, pampering your taste buds with a symphony of sensations. Today marked my inaugural voyage to this concealed treasure, and what a revelation it proved to be! Prepare to be dazzled by the sheer brilliance of their fare. The star of the show, the fundamental burger, stole the limelight. Its impeccable fusion of flavors performed a delightful waltz on my palate, leaving an indelible mark of sheer delight. Accompanying me on this gourmet expedition was a dear companion, and together, we marveled at the enchantment unfolding before us. The staff, a charming ensemble of warmth and professionalism, added an extra layer of allure to the occasion. Their sincere amiability and unwavering courtesy cultivated an atmosphere of ease, akin to dining among cherished companions. To our delight, they graced us with their presence, ensuring our every whim was catered to a small yet profound gesture that elevated the entire experience. Picture this: a quaint outdoor patio, bathed in natural sunlight, where each morsel can be relished while embraced by natures gentle caress. As the sun-kissed breeze imparts secrets from the bay, you find yourself enveloped in an enchanting ambiance. And if you choose the indoor retreat, the interiors radiate an inviting snugness thats equally captivating. The menu, a symphony of culinary marvels, unfurls like a tale waiting to be devoured. From tantalizing shared plates to elaborate gourmet creations, every whim is catered to with finesse. This debut experience felt like an epiphany a genuine testament to the captivating allure that draws a crowd time and again. Amidst all the accolades, lets not overlook the chef the virtuoso behind the scenes. The fantastic, flavorful burger stood as a testament to their mastery of the culinary arts. With each bite, I sensed their passion and expertise setting off a culinary fireworks display, painting my palate with elation. As time elapsed, it became evident why this place remains a perennial favorite. A bustling hub of culinary enthusiasts, it thrives with vitality and vivacity. And yes, Im already counting down the days until my next visit, as one solitary sojourn is simply inadequate. Adding to the enchantment is the pricing affordable without compromising on excellence. This culinary experience is not about breaking the bank, but rather enriching your spirit with flavors that linger well beyond the meals end. And then theres the view oh, the view! Imagine gazing out upon the expansive canvas of English Bay, right before your eyes. Its a symphony of blues, an enchanting panorama that elevates your dining escapade to an unparalleled realm. In conclusion, this was beyond merely a meal; it was a voyage, an expedition through tastes, textures, and emotions. Set against the heart of English Bay, this culinary haven offers more than words can capture. Thus, if you seek an unforgettable dining soiree that titillates your senses and leaves you yearning for more, your quest ends here. Your next epicurean adventure awaits. I wholeheartedly endorse this establishment; the cuisine is delectable and surpasses expectations. Thank you for the amazing experience ! Wheelchair accessibility: Vonns presents an outstanding dining opportunity crafted to cater to all individuals. Their venue features a generously sized outdoor patio, ideal for relishing delectable dishes amidst natures beauty. Furthermore, their capacious indoor area has been meticulously planned to guarantee easy access for wheelchair users, extending a warm invitation to all patrons to fully enjoy their culinary delights. The restaurant places paramount importance on guest comfort and pleasure, taking pride in their commitment to delivering an unforgettable dining affair tailored to the preferences of all.

Bro I ve been eyeing down this place for almost a year now. Never had the time to try it until this week. My mind was boggled when I opened this box. I was in awe. I was screaming in the car because it looked so good. And that first bite of the truffle cheesesteak was insane. The fries were insane. I loved everything about this spot. I am bringing friends to discover this with me.

This is one of the best burgers I ve ever had! Shame I leave the country the day after. The brioche bun was glorious, gave the burger a creamy, buttery taste. Truffle chips were great too. Service was super kind, attentive but not too much. Thanks so much for a great meal, hope I can come back someday!
YES. Amazing. All of it. Chicken is cooked to perfection.  Beef is tender and buns are fresh. Fries  yup!  Get some of this. Well worth the wait if there s a line up.

Totally understand the hype with this place! My friend and I ordered the Birria tacos and they were hands down the best Birria tacos I ve had in Vancouver. Filled with so much flavor and has a nice spice to it. The consomme and the garlic sauce on the side was also delicious. Sad that it s only around for a limited time but it s definitely a must try! My only complain was the service, the waitresses took a while to come take our orders as well as give our bills. However the food did come quite fast which was nice. Another down side is the fact that there s no toilet in the restaurant. Other than that, great food!!
The sandwiches are just amazing. We ve had the hamburger, cheesesteak, and the chicken burger they re are exceptionally made I should say the staff do seem totally lost during busy hours though :)

Had the pleasure of dining at Vonns and I must say, it was a beautiful experience. The restaurants biggest plus point for me is the fact that they offer halal options, which can be hard to come by. The beef and chicken dishes were both flavorful and cooked to perfection, with just the right amount of crispiness and warmth. The staff were incredibly friendly and accommodating, making our dining experience all the more enjoyable. The restaurant was very well managed in terms of seating and orders, which is always a plus. Located near English Bay, Vonns is definitely worth a visit if youre in town. Overall, I would highly recommend Vonns to anyone looking for a delicious and authentic halal dining experience. The food is top-notch, the staff are friendly and welcoming, and the atmosphere is warm and inviting. 5 stars!

Didn t have any steak when we went but we got the XD and top gun. Both were amazing. All the fries are hand scooped out of potatoes then fried. Never had something like that before. Parking: Downtown street parking hard to find

We live in the area and have walked by Vonns many times and finally made a special time to go and they are awesome. From the super friendly service to the quality of the food and we couldn t even finish our cheesesteak and x3 patty Burger   (that I destroyed later at home lol) and it s such a nice restaurant with great views of English bay and the area. No question we will be coming back!, Cheers!

Love it. Will be back again and again. Did a take away, took a tad bit longer than expected but I really enjoyed the monster serving of Nashville chicken and those truffle fries! One of the best halal burger joints I think!

I came for the original Philly Cheesesteak sandwich, it completely satisfied my craving and lived up to expectations. Great flavour, perfect amount of sauce and cheese, soft bun. The truffle scoop fries were crispy with some thicker, more wedge sized pieces, seasoned well but they didnt come with a sauce so they were on the drier side. Twice as much as I would spend on 2 items like this but it really is a great sandwich!
Absolutely amazing food!! The owner was super friendly and helpful! If I ever come back to the area, I will definitely be eating here again.

Walking around English Bay area in super hot weather, we just wanted to have a drink and some simple bites, passed by this restaurant, initially we were not so sure, but it totally exceeded our expectations, we only ordered truffle fries/ chips and a salad, they are probably the best fries/ chips and salad we have tasted. The staff was very friendly and attentive to customer needs too. Highly recommend!

We really enjoy the food here. Not only is the staff friendly but the food is amazing. On top of that everything is halal. You will get your burger always freshly made. Taste is great and the meat is perfectly cooked. They have different portion for fries which is a plus. This location is small so most of the time it will take a waiting until you get a table but trust me it s worth the wait. If they would move to a bigger location I am sure it would be always packed! Keep up the good work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Loved having you with us  look forward to seeing you again

reviews.review_text: Friendly waitresses, the service can be slower just because they re trying to keep up with the place full all the time! Have patience, don t go hangry, and it s worth the wait! Great classic cheeseburger and crispy chicken sandwich!

Was feeling like a cheesesteak so I found Vonns, and glad I did. Its easy to walk past, but the views of English Bay cant be beat. They have a patio area with umbrellas, as well as a shaded indoor seating area, but the whole restaurant is open to the bay so you get plenty of sun and noise from the beach. Food was fantastic, I dont know if Id go with the truffle cheesesteak again (its savory enough without the truffle  ), but the staff were friendly and accommodating, if a little busy. Wheelchair accessibility: They have a patio that opens right onto the sidewalk, with a pretty wide opening in the fence, and there are no elevation changes inside the seating area. Not sure if the washroom is accessible.

This was on my list to check out while in Vancouver. It was absolutely delicious and lived up to my expectations from reviews and photos. I had the truffle fries with the classic burger and it was PHENOMENAL! The homemade fries/chips are sooo mouthwatering, I think I ll come and get some as takeout tomorrow. The burger was great too, one of the best simple burgers I ve had. Prices are so reasonable. Only thing I think I would change is the menu, it s a little small. Would be nice to have more drinks available or greens for on the side as well. The service was very friendly and the place is small and cozy. I will definitely be coming back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Lauren, Thank you for your review. We love your feedback. We re on it, check back with us in a few weeks to see the additional options on our menu. Thank you again

reviews.review_text: Wow! Amazing! Their cheesesteak was so delicious and it came with so much meat for a $16 plate! The chicken burger was also spicy and so delicious! They also have a combo which is fries and drinks that comes out for $5! Really good! Definitely will come back!

Very small dining room with students, families, and retired folks. The regular burger is big, meat has great flavor, even the bun is good. Truffle fries are a unique shape and worth ordering just those.  We couldn t finish it all, so asked for a to go box and was pleasantly surprised the fries reheat well the next day. Service was quick, friendly

I was looking forward to eating there! Its quite far from my place but I took advantage of a walk on the seawall to stop here to have dinner. The chicken burger is delicious and generous, too bad that the fries are not included in the side. Its crispy as wished and the chicken is juicy. The steak was overcooked but the waitress was very nice and made it up for us. We found it okay but it was not our preferred option. The truffle fries were good but too salted, I will take regular fries next time :) Will definitely come back for the chicken sandwich though.

This is a classic joint! With food we keep coming back to no matter how long it s been because its sooo hard to get a place since its quaint. Service is always top notch and we re always expecting a high bar with the quality.

Excellent place to dine right at the doorstep of English bay. The team here takes their quality seriously and it shows in their ingredient selection and in house sourcing. The Philly cheesesteak is my usual go to but their dynamic menu specials and limited time offerings make me want to try different items each time. The fries and all the varieties they come are a must try especially the Top Gun. The service has been consistently good each time and management is willing to go the extra mile to make your experience special. These guys take pride in what they do and it definitely shows in an exceptional all around experience each time

Unique potato chips covered in truffle, nice crispy potatoes, satisfies a big appetite. Ordered the Medi Chic Sub and it was a delightful lunch. The sauce complements the sub and the sauerkraut really balances out the sandwich. I would come back here and try others. A bit steep on the wallet, however the location and especially view from the veranda is nice. Great halal spot. Would recommend others to come try as one of the go-to spots in yvr. The water for $2.35 on the menu is definitely a turn off, bring your own bottle :)

Vonn s never disappoints! They re classic beef burger is my go to but last night I took a few bites from my husbands Chicken Nash & oh my goooodnessss! It was SOOOO yummy! The chicken was tender, juicy & the sauce they use is very flavourful! Honestly, you can t go wrong with anything on their menu! Also be sure to try their truffle fries! So yum!
Does it worth driving the 29 RV through downtown Vancouver? Absolutely yes. We ordered the classic burger and the Vonns Special (in the photo)

If I was a local, I would be eating at Vonns all the time. Everything we had here was amazing. When we got here, there was a bit of a wait but we didn t mind because we had heard positive things. Everything on the menu sounded really good so it was hard to pick just a few things. We ended up ordering The Rocket to share, which was my favourite item and something I highly recommend. We also ordered The XD burger and a Chic Halloumi Sando. Both of those were also really good and left us very full. The service is also great, with some really friendly staff members. Also, everything on the menu is halal so to anyone visiting Vancouver looking for halal restaurants, this is the spot! Easy 5 stars.

The food and vibe was amazing!! Love that there s finally a restaurant that serves halal steaks The staff is super friendly and accommodating even during busy times. Portions were great and the price was affordable for the quality. Our server Cherry was very observant and immediately brought us a complimentary drink after I spilt mine. Will definitely be back soon!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad you enjoyed the steak, Farina. Thanks so much for coming in, and for taking the time to write a review. Hope to see you again.

reviews.review_text: Before I came to Vancouver from Toronto, I heard a lot of good things about this place. Fast forward to today, I was not disappointed. Had the Vonns Special Philly cheesesteak with Truffle fries and the Top Gun loaded fries. One of the best cheesteaks Ive had in my life. Will definitely be back before I fly back to Toronto. Owner, if youre reading this, please open up a location in Toronto.

Finally! Find myself a halal-certified gourmet burger restaurant in Vancouver after only having Mediterranean/Persian foods whenever I eat out Officially had my first burger in Canada at Vonns Denman and it definitely set a high bar already! I tried their special menu of the week which is the XD burger. Premium beef patty coated with seasoned melted cheese. I was a bit surprised because it was a bit spicy but as a spicy food lover, my tongue like the flavor burst of it! The portion was more than decent, I guess it will keep you full until the next day . You should try to dip your burger and fries to the mayo-like sauce next to the ketchup, it adds some bold flavor-enhancing kicks to both of them!! Definitely will come back to try out their steak    and chicken burgers

Downright the best best burgers and Philly Cheesesteak sandwich Ive ever had. Their chicken tenders were also really good. The overall service quality, to the ambience, and the food quality was exceptional. My previous best was Gladiators in Mississuaga, but now this takes the first spot. I just got to know theyre opening soon in Downtown Toronto and Im already waiting to have it again soon :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Muhammad, thank you so much for the glowing review. Look forward to seeing you again

reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the best burger places Ive  been to in a while. Their burgers are nice and simple and really take you back to the feel of a classic cheeseburger. Simple, juicy and greasy! Their menu keeps it simple as well. It can be found and vonns.com. The Chicken Burgers are MASSIVE. Easily two chicken breasts worth of meat. Ive had a taste of the steak sandwich too and it is pretty good. The portions are massive here and will definitely fill you up. I typically go for a classic if Im not too hungry, a double if Im pretty hungry and a Daredevil (triple patty) if Im feeling dangerous. The Truffle Fries are a MUST try. Soft on the inside, crispy on the outside and paired with their dip is chefs kiss. Regular fries just dont cut it anymore for me. The service is excellent with the staff always friendly and patient waiting to answer any questions you have. The place has great decor that appears to change seasonally as well as a very clean interior with plastic dividers. They have a covered outside area and some indoor seating and the location is less than a 2 minute walk from the beach. Definitely a must try when you are here!

I was shook by how amazing the food tasted. Especially the chicken burgers. Everything was so delicious. The first bite won us over. The helpers in the restaurant were super kind. I was impressed by my first visit.

Double chicken burger was killer. A lil heavy on the breading but that was the biggest chicken burger I have ever seen in my life, I almost couldnt finish it and that alone shocked me lol coming back next time Im around for a triple smash

This place is amazing! From the food to the ambiance to the service, everything is top-notch. Perlin, our server, was fantastic! Its obvious that making costumers happy is their top priority. The food is quite tasty (see pictures). They made us feel welcomed and provided us with an incredible time. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the awesome review. Very happy to see you ve heard a pleasant experience with us. We hope to see you again

reviews.review_text: Best HALAL spot for burgers and steak in downtown Vancouver! My family and I are visiting from Toronto and we were recommended to try Vonn s and the food did not disappoint! We ordered the Steak Frites and the steak was cooked so well - it was juicy and perfect. The rocket fries appetizer was fulfilling but also really good, definitely something to order if you have a large party and need an appetizer to share. The XD burger was so fresh! Even the chicken tenders were so good! The food is phenomenal! Definitely a spot to check out if you re in the Vancouver area! Its right in front of a beach waterfront too so the views are nice and the area is great to walk around.

TOP MF TIER BRO Visiting Vancouver for one week and we had to come back a second time because it s THAT GOOD. Everything s halal too which is This time around we got the birria tacos which were a 10/10 but last time we got burgers, which was also a 10/10. I highly recommend the truffle fries

Very warm welcome. Big smiles and seated right away. First time however am always quick with the menue and so we got to put in our orders really quick too   and omg. Look at those pictures. Please tag me in your post

Vonns is by far the best place to eat in Vancouver! I am not lying. The Top Gun Seriously Get That.! Amazing atmosphere  and the Employees and Owner are soo nice Knowlegable! Best Food Ive had for a long time! THANK YOU!!^_^ IM COMING HERE FROM NOW ON!  Look at the pics if you dont believe me.!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Frank, that s very kind of you. Thank you for the awesome recommendation. The Top Gun fries are for sure popular. We hope to see you again soon

reviews.review_text: Heard a lot about Vonns and totally loved the taste! It was filling! We took takeout as we were on bike but I would recommend to dine in to avoid soggy burger! Next time would def dine in and try their Van-famous steak!!

My family and I were vacationing in Vancouver and decided to eat at this place based off reviews online. Once there since we were a larger party we had to wait for a table however, we were educated on the menu and what they are known for. My husband and I shared the chicken sandwich and a classic cheesesteak! WOW! Not only were the portions huge but they were AMAZING!! My 1 year old and 3 year old shared the chicken strips and ate almost all of it! That s how much they loved it! Everything is freshly cooked and so tasty! The owner checked on us and made sure everything was to our liking! I definitely recommend stopping here!! It is also perfect walking distance to the beach!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for coming by. We hope you have a safe trip back to the states

reviews.review_text: had lunch there with my bf as he recommended it and I was surprised how much I love the food and how fresh the food was. Also the servers were really nice and friendly! Definitely a must try if you love chicken or food in general. It s also Halal certified so bonus for that

Delicious food. We ordered the Vonns special cheese steak and the classic chicken burger. Both were amazing, and tasted so fresh. The service was also super quick and awesome. Our server was very friendly and we got our food a lot faster than we expected. The prices are also fair and the portions are great. Would highly recommend this halal burger joint.

Vonns is magical I loved the ambiance of the restaurant and the food is really mesmerizing top notch their burgers are so delicious and juicy I couldn t believe it. Especially their truffle fries are something else I haven t tasted this type of fries anywhere and to top it off it s HALAL
Best HALAL fast genuine food in Vancouver!! Burgers/  Steaks/  Fries & truffles Fries and more! Just W0W!! Keep up the good work guys!
I ordered online. The food was very tasty and absolutely filling. The truffle fries were more slices of potato to me, yet very delicious.

Great halal food, absolutely amazing location. Both our orders, the burger and the cheesesteak sandwich were tasty and we absolutely devoured it. Our server Sherry was really nice and kind as well. Will definitely eat here again

I was so pleasantly surprised dining in a walk by last week- the flavors on the cheesesteak , truffle fries & quesadilla were great- nice spice level, came out super hot & not too salty   great portion size too. Staff was friendly & engaging  i hope they can expand soon! Will be back asap!

Its our first time to try this restaurant and the food was amazing. We ordered mushroom swiss burger & phillysteak sandwich combo with truffle fries and its delicious. The truffle fries is highly recommended. Yummy! No wonder why there is always a line up. We will definitely come back with my family. Staff are very friendly and accommodating too!

What are you doing if you haven t tried Vonns? Seriously the best food! worldly people and service! Amazing vibe and atmosphere! And the view is just phenomenal. To eat in here is a blessing. 10/10 recommend :)

This place live up to the hype hands down, the freshest, most delicious ever fast food on the streets of Vancouver. Welcoming, efficient and professional staff added a lot to the experience. Vonns would make your sweetheart melt.

Surprised. That a steak sandwich has better steak than a standalone steak at other restaurants. The ribeye steak was incredibly tender. And you get a lot of it (1.5 steaks?) stuffed into one sandwich. Need to start a new paragraph to talk about the truffle fries, which were amazing. Cut like thick chips. Thickly crispy on the outside, soft in the middle. Dressed in a truffle parmesan sauce. This was close to the best fries/chips Ive ever had, and Im a connoisseur. Even the salad is worth mentioning as it had a tasty dressing with crispy (fried garlic?) topping. Only complaint is the price. $19 for the steak sando.
I had the classic burger but let me tell you it was delicious   everything on it was so good!
Great portions, super friendly staff and an amazing vibe. Must try place if you re looking for a nice spot with beach view Food : 5/5

Simply one of the best in the city. They used to not smash their burger and it was insane but they were forced to smash all of them or something, still, 5 star burgers. The chicken fingers, you have to get them hot and fresh right away, are literally the best in the world. No seriously, they are simply incredible. Delicately juicy but with the perfect thin crunch, unbelievable. For fries go with the truffle fries, bomb, they also make for great munchie chips for later. (They keep in the fridge overnight, which is not possible to say about regular french fries). I still need to try the cheesesteaks etc., but i wont be able to resist the chicken fingers again next time i order out, i cook a lot at home and know my spots, this is one of a very select few that are at the top of the list. Order up the whole menu, and enjoy.

Review Spoiler Alert: Best Halal Burger in BC! Firstly, kudos to brother Zuhair for his amazing service. We went close to the closing time, and the restaurant was packed but he made sure we had our food before they close for the night. Vonns serve undoubtedly the most flavorful items. We tried the double patty beef burger and the Vonns special cheesesteak. The patties of the burger were juicy enough, and cooked to the perfection. The bun was soft but not soggy. The fries complimented the burger and made the meal wholesome. The cheesesteak was equally delicious. Will we visit this restaurant again? Of course, whenever we have the cravings for burger, this will be our place to go.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: You re too kind  thank you so much for your kindness and we hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: Amazing burger, the best one I had in Vancouver. The fries were also really good. Overall was an excellent meal. Service is very efficient and friendly. Great location as well. Have nothing negative to say about this place.
The BEST Ive eaten since my arrival in Vancouver a year ago  awesome!

Was waiting in line for this amazing Halal restaurant when the owner himself stopped by and had a genuine conversation with each and every customer. You can tell he and his staff have a massive amount of love for the food they make and the people they serve. The Birria Tacos were the best I ve ever had, with the meat being so tender and juicy! A must for anyone visiting the area, cannot think of a better spot to eat.
Ive been looking for a halal steak for more than a year now and finally found the perfect steak. Had the most amazing food there and their truffle fries is must!

WOW! Best burgers in town! My friend recommended that I try Vonns while I was in Vancouver, and after trying the beef and the chicken burger here I can confirm that this is absolutely one of the best burgers I have had. I highly recommend trying their Nashville Chicken burger, and the truffle fries.

4 of us went there last night. 2 of my friends ordered the special XD burger, I ordered steak, and one ordered grilled chicken halloumi burger. Amazing food! One of the greatest hospitalities I have ever seen! I think it was the owner himself going around, welcoming and talking about the specials to every guests on every table. When he heard that it was our first time dining in at Vonns, he suggested that we dont take combos with each meal but get one dish to share and when we chose truffle fries, he said they will ne on the house! He made sure to take our feedback after we finished eating (we couldnt exactly finish those large portions, so we had to pack up the leftovers!). My steak was medium instead of the rare medium that it was supposed to be (it still tasted great!). The man apologized profusely for this tiny mistake and did not charge me for my entire meal and made me promise that I visit a second time for the perfect buttery medium rare steak. I never messaged because it felt like ripping off a small business. But when I posted a review on Facebook, they messaged me themselves with the voucher for free meals for 2. They really make you feel special! Thank you Vonns for making our first visit (potentially of many) an excellent experience! They deserve more than 5/5! P.S. their new XD burger is totally worth the hype!

Such a wonderful place! We ordered classic burger & original chicken burger and bother were so delicious, the fries also is freshly made and so yummy. The staff are very kind, they even offered us truffle chips on the house that was soooo good. Delicious food, nice decoration, perfect location. Highly recommended
I love the food here. Very big portion sizes,  the aesthetics of the restaurant are great, and located close to English Bay. Great Halal food spot!

Even with the place slammed they waitresses managed to serve us swiftly and paid extra attention to everyone s orders to make sure they got it right. I also wanted to give props to the waitress. Even with the two guys next to us being entitled and acting like young Andrew states and they were the center of the universe and bad mouthing the waitress, she still managed to smile and take their orders promptly and friendly (which is more than I would have done). They were nice, efficient and the food was some of the best I have ever had.
The food is unique delicious just like the service everything with a smile if youre in Vancouver and you havent come here you havent you havent visited Vancouver
This is the spot. Massive portions, tastes phenomenal, great vibes and its halal. Cant go wrong. This is the spot.

Absolutely amazing. The food was truly amazing. Must try their truffle fries. Can guarantee you wont be satisfied with one plate. Additionally the burger and the Philly Cheese steak sandwich, just delicious. I thanked the chef and staff on my way out as well as it was so good! Customer service is also excellent

This place is amazing! I had the beyond burger and truffle fries which were delicious. The service was great too, the servers are also great and always efficient, happy and polite. I recommend to everyone! I would like to come back here again and again.

I went to Vonns Denman today Noon, we dropped there around 3 pm, the restaurant was full and there was people waiting outsied to enter as well. I ordered the XD Burger, my son & my husband ordered the Classic burger. Their Burger was the best burger ever. We enjoyed our meals, th burger was so juicy and fresh. The quality and quantity was more than awesome. The staff was really friendly and work hard to help everyone. We will revisit again for sure. We were so happy to visit such a good restaurant as Vonns . Thank you for the great job. Keep it up

I have been here twice now, ordering for takeout both times, and both experiences have been great. This most recent visit we were kindly greeted and helped by Dipika. She was so personable, genuine and helped make our experience pleasantly memorable, all while just simply ordering and taking food to go. They kindly allowed us to try their truffle fries and I feel they were generous towards us. The classic burgers, regular fries and truffle fries were all very tasty. Thank you for another great experience! God bless you and your team
Such a cute and cosy setting. Excellent food and excellent service. The owner and staff were super accommodating! We got the mushroom swiss burger along with a plate of truffle fries Both were 10/10!

Probably one of my favourite spots in downtown. The vibe, the service and most importantly, the food is good. Only thing to watch out for would be how busy it gets and you could end up waiting 1 hour for a seat.

Came to Vonns with my extremely picky family after my graduation and the staff/management here absolutely blew us away with their service and food. They were so quick to find us a spot for 9, helpful with the menu since we were a big group ordering many items and accommodated everyone who was vegetarian very kindly and easily. My dad has said a restaurant was delicious only a handful of times and Vonns is now on that list with their exceptional food. Can t wait to come back!

Food was amazing. Halal place right by English bay in Vancouver! We tried there special Philly cheese steak. It was so juicy & fries were amazing too! We loved the service, staff were friendly and the owner was courteous and had a lengthy chat with us in the beginning & end of our meal. The restaurant was beautifully designed and was clean.Great experience would definitely recommend this place to friends & family!
Amazing food. Visiting from Toronto and glad I found this halal burger place! Best truffle fries ever (topgun on the menu is a must try)!

One of the best places for halal, juicy and flavorful burgers, sandwiches, steaks and more. I ordered the steak and fries (truffle fries) and i have never tasted a more flavorful medium steak. I personally prefer rare but this one was surprisingly juicy and full of flavor. The sauces on the side dis not disappoint either. Definitely a must have for everyone. Highly recommended. Will definitely come again!

I regret not taking pictures of the burgers and the cheesesteak truffle because this was amazing. The classic burger was juicy and with a lot of flavour and the cheesesteak truffle was very juicy as well, definitely recommend this if you re looking for those two dishes

Amazing Burgers, awesome new little place downtown. Everything was really good quality, service was decently quick and friendly, and decor was awesome. Love the setup and the way the wall opens up giving it a nice vibe especially when the sun is out. Definitely a must try!

MUST TRY!!!!!!! the food here was unreal. So delicious and fresh. The staff were also very friendly and I loved the aesthetic. Best Buffalo chicken sandwich I think I ve ever had 10/10. And they have great tasting unique sodas - try the passion fruit!

This Sunday , 16th September we as a family went to Vonn around 8:30 pm in the night . The restaurant was full of patrons and we had to wait more than 25 minutes . There was a miscommunication on the part of the host server so we were not happy for the wait . Any way the owner , Mr. Juhaer understood our frustration . He apologized . The food was as usual delicious and the final twist of the evening was the owner refused to take the payment and even declined to allow me to pay the tips . My wife was pleasantly embarrassed with the owner s goodwill gesture . We profusely thanked him for the hospitality . We prayed from the core of our heart for continued blessings and success  of the owner . Highly recommended the cuisine , professional attitude .

Gave me the best steak experience I have ever had in my life thus far. This place has phenomenal service, outstanding food, incredible scenery and is overall an amazing place to eat. Vonns has perfected that feeling of eating good food.

I was in town with family for only 4 days and the food was sooo delicious that I couldnt resist to visit Vonns twice in 3 days. Classic burger was our favorite and it is one of the best one on the menu. Super juicy beef patty with their signature sauce, the burger is one of the best we ever had. We also tried Birria Tacos which had super soft beef and flavorful broth. Excellent food. Service is exceptional! We would love to visit this place in the future.

This place was amazing, we went on New years. It was pretty busy, but not too crowded. The burgers there are huge and looked soo delicious. We ordered the new launched steak. Its called steak frites. Its not on the menu yet, it was super yummy! I would recommend it anytime. They normally make the steak medium, then u can have it with fries or the potato slices thing, forgot what its called, and it comes with sauces its so good. The steak was so soft and tender. Its halaal too, for those who need to know...It was delicious, it comes with ketchup and chipotle sauce and garlic sauce. Parking is on the street, so stones becomes difficult to find. Staff are very friendly. The meat runs out, so call in before you come to check if they are open and still have their meat. I would recommend it anytime and would go again anytime!

Vonns burgers in Vancouver is the one-stop-shop for burger lovers in the city! Ive always been on the hunt for the perfect smash burger, and I can confidently say that Vonns has nailed it. From the juicy patty to the perfectly melted cheese, everything is cooked to absolute perfection. I cant recommend Vonns burgers enough - its simply the best smash burger around! So if youre a burger fanatic like me, make sure you pay them a visit. Your tastebuds will thank you for it!
Everything was cooked quickly and was delicious. Its a bit pricey for standard fare, but very tasty. If you want good food, this can give you some.

Randomly stumbled across this gem as me and pal were out for a bite to eat. We walked by and noticed a table getting served these huge, magnificent fried chicken sandwiches. We immediately stopped the search, to check this out for ourselves.  We had their two fried chicken sandwiches and they are the best I have ever had, and I have had many in my day. Didn t check anything else out on the menu and when I do come back, I probably still won t because I will be having the same thing again. This place slaps!

This place is amazing! Firstly well spaced and covid-19 protocol respectful guidelines and contact tracing, yet not overbearing. Secondly.... And most importantly.... The food is amazing. Vonns special is so tasty.  I never really liked a Cheese Steak sandwich before theirs. Another favorite is their chicken strips/fingers.  They offer about 5 different dip options if you ask for them!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Neal, absolute pleasure having you with us. Thanks for stopping by and glad to hear you had a pleasant experience with us. We appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you again soon

reviews.review_text: The best halal option in the lower mainland hands down. They even have gluten free options like the birria tacos. The cheesesteak is incredible and their truffle fries are a must. Whenever someone visits Vancouver and they ask me where to eat, this is always my first recommendation. The best in town.

I ordered the mushroom burger with truffle fries and it was amazing. The portions are beyond generous and service was great. The owner/manager seem to be on top of everything and waitresses were very pleasant.

Loved the vibes here. Service was great and food was delicious. Lots of options to chose from, my favourite was the rocket and the truffle fries! In a place where it s very hard to find halal options I was grateful to have found this spot.

Great and tasty halal food! To be honest the first halal burger and steak that I have ever ate in vancouver. I ordered steak and a classic beef burger  and the location is great too.. love the places and the food, would definitely come again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Such kind words. Thank you for taking the time. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: One of the best halal food places in Vancouver! The cheesesteak was amazing and the truffle fries were quite good. Note: restaurant doesn t have restrooms.

What a great overall experience. I wish I took a picture of the layout in the restaurant. The doors fully open so you feel as though you re sitting outside even when you re inside. Food was excellent. Had the truffle cheese steak. I added jalapenos and it made it perfect. From the meat to the veggies and the special sauce they put on it the whole meal was great. I will definitely go back. The location is one that is extremely convenient for when you re on the beach and want a quality burger or cheese steak. It s a stones throw from English bay.

this place was amazing! all halal options and they had a pretty good menu so we had a hard time choosing but ended up getting their famous chicken sandwich. the portion is huge and food is very filling. the waiters were super friendly and very nice which made the waiting time go by very fast. thank you to the waiters. definitely a must go place

Very polite staff and excellent customer service. The place is very warm and calming. I really enjoyed the outside patio and loved how there were open-sinks (so that you wouldn t have to open doors) and how the kitchen was so open and you could see how clean it was. Plus, what was something that was really interesting to me was that you could pay after your meal. ****A very special feature for me was that all the food served at this restaurant was halal.**** The staff recommended the double cheeseburger combo (fries and soda can extra 4$) and it s absolutely delicious. Overall this place was in a very nice location with a nice theme and I recommend this nice restaurant to everybody
